data.name: Nachkriegsratten Punk-Rock Puzzle
data.detailed_description:
FEATURES


  • 24 punky jigsaw puzzles to solve
  • in 6 sizes each, makes 144 PUZZLES!
  • go crazy with the puzzle piece rotation
  • 6 atmospheric mouse cursors
  • 1 unatmospheric mouse cursors
  • The new Nachkriegsratten album “Hia Hua” in permanent rotation to punk around
  • PUNK ROCK UNTIL THE DOCTOR COMES!
  • HIA HUA! SHUT UP I WANT TO PUZZLE!

Tracks and Puzzle scenes:


01 Ich Wünsch Euch….mp3
02 Leben Egal!.mp3
03 T-34.mp3
04 Das Malheur.mp3

21 Nutzlos.mp3

data.short_description: Nachkriegsratten (Post-war rats), probably the first punk band to combine life-negating noise with turtle-like deceleration in a puzzle game. 24 mouth-painted pictures in 6 different sizes. are you brave enough? Have you ever danced with the Lumberjack Bear in the pale moonlight? HIA HUA!
data.supported_languages:
German*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD A6-9500
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Sound Card: Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 3
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD A6-9500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 / AMD Radeon VEGA or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

highlighted.name: I wish you a merry cancer

content_descriptors.notes: Vulgar, insulting language. Use of tobacco and alcohol. German Punk Rock.
